title: RBI monetary policy on Fri; mixed expectations on rate cut, status quo
description: MUMBAI: RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra will announce the bi-monthly monetary policy on Friday amid mixed expectations of a 25 basis points rate cut as well as the possibility of the central bank opting for status quo. Reserve Bank’s rate-setting panel — Monetar…
